settings.heading: Become a Table & Twine Affiliate
settings.text: Do you have a strong web presence? Is your audience hungry for delicious, restaurant-quality food that can be prepared in a flash? If so, you could earn attractive commissions through Table & Twine’s affiliate program.
settings.box_text: Learn more about how the Humane Society of Charlotte supports pets & their owners.

settings.title: Receive the tools you need
settings.text: When you partner with us, we’ll provide you with a unique landing page, promo code, and Table & Twine marketing content.

settings.title: Promote our award-winning meal kit delivery service
settings.text: Introduce your audience to the fresh flavors and convenience of Table & Twine via your blog, website, social media, or newsletter.

settings.title: Receive yummy kick-backs
settings.text: We offer competitive commission rates that’ll boost your profits. Plus, we dish up delicious discounts on chef-prepared meals.

settings.title: Competitive Commissions
settings.text: On every chef-prepared meal kit ordered using your unique promo code

settings.title: Table & Twine Marketing Content
settings.text: That engages audiences, attracts more followers, and boosts earnings

settings.title: Savory Customer Offers
settings.text: Discounts and no-charge add-ons that’ll make dinnertime brilliant, not boring

settings.title: Complimentary Meal Kits
settings.text: So you can experience the fresh flavors and unparalleled convenience of Table & Twine for yourself

settings.title: We carefully curate  thoughtful menus
settings.text: Our chefs want to bring an impressive culinary experience to every customer’s table. That’s why they spend hours each week developing restaurant-quality meals that incorporate bold, fresh flavors.

settings.title: We don’t let convenience  overshadow quality
settings.text: From steak frites to chicken confit, every dinner from Table & Twine only takes 15 minutes to prepare. But trust us: the food will taste like you spent hours in the kitchen.

settings.title: We help customers cook  five-star meals
settings.text: When you partner with Table & Twine, you gain the expertise of a professional chef. Our culinary team will handle the more tedious aspects of cooking for you and then provide step-by-step directions to help you bring the dish together.

settings.title: We value quality  ingredients
settings.text: Unlike other meal kit delivery services, we never source ingredients from big conglomerates. Instead, we purchase seasonal produce and ethically-raised meats from local farmers. This ensures every dish is fresh and flavorful.
Forget everything you know about meal kit delivery services. At Table & Twine, we stand out from competitors because:

settings.title: What does Table & Twine look for in an affiliate?
settings.text: Table & Twine partners with like-minded influencers whose audiences value convenient, restaurant-quality food. We do NOT partner with individuals who promote violence, drugs, or obscene gestures or language.

settings.title: Do I need to live in North Carolina or South Carolina to be an affiliate?
settings.text: Yes. Since Table & Twine currently only serves customers in Charlotte, Raleigh, and Charleston, we give preference to individuals who live in the Carolinas.

settings.title: How do I earn a commission?
settings.text: Each time a meal kit is ordered using your promo code, you’ll receive a commission.

settings.section_text: When you join Table & Twine’s affiliate program, you’ll earn savory commissions while introducing your audience to delicious, convenient food. It’s a win-win!
